Create BIOC rules based on the set of attribute-value pairs to automatically convert the leads into alerts.

Selected Answer: D

Leads are not static IOCs.

questions.question_text: What should you do to automatically convert leads into alerts after investigating a lead?

choices.B: Build a search query using Query Builder or XQL using a list of IOCs.
choices.D: Create BIOC rules based on the set of the collected attribute-value pairs over the affected entities concluded during the lead hunting.
choices.A: Lead threats can't be prevented in the future because they already exist in the environment.
choices.C: Create IOC rules based on the set of the collected attribute-value pairs over the affected entities concluded during the lead hunting.

choices.B: Installation >> Reconnaissance >> Weaponisation & Delivery >> Exploitation >> Command & Control >> Actions on the objective
choices.A: Actions on the objective >> Reconnaissance >> Weaponisation & Delivery >> Exploitation >> Installation >> Command & Control
choices.C: Reconnaissance >> Installation >> Weaponisation & Delivery >> Exploitation >> Command & Control >> Actions on the objective
